author: A_Brickset_user
title: Don't Get in the way
review: As regular flight sets go, this set is pretty clad. The Daeredevil itself is the best part of the set, and the coolest loking jet in Lego. The stupid looking Octan Man should be kicked out of the set, and thrown in dump because he is not Extreme Team Classified. The helicopter is nice but flemsy and weak. The set is one of the best around!

author: A_Brickset_user
title: Jet
review: I never used the helicopter for much (even though the glass is pretty versatile), The best part of the set by far is the jet.I have turned the jet into a spy plane and a AWACS radar plane.I also have addedd some of the long neon colored antennas pointing forward and called the plane a space fighter

author: mrmitch
title: Dare to be Great !
review: This set is awesome! The plane is very detailed and unique in the way the entire nose tilts down to insert the pilot. The top of the plane hinges open to reveal the engine/ray gun? The helicopter is different from any other copter in my collection it is built tough and fun to play with. My favorite is the 6 wheels truck and the gas trailor. All three mini figures are detail and different. This set has alot of playability and is a great addition to any town or city collector. Recommend this set, orig retail on this set was $29.99 - you get alot for your money with this set, one of my all time favorites.
